fr.liglab.adele.icasa.location.util

Interface ZoneTrackerCustomizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZoneTracker

    public interface ZoneTrackerCustomizer
    User: garciai@imag.fr Date: 8/2/13 Time: 11:25 AM

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addedZone(Zone zone)
      A device tracked by the Tracker object has been added in the list.

    • Method Detail

      • addingZone

        boolean addingZone(Zone zone)
        A zone is being added to the Tracker object. This method is called before a zone which matched the search parameters of the Tracker object is added to it. This method must return true to be tracked for this zone object.
        Parameters:
        zone - the zone being added to the Tracker object.
        Returns:
        true if the zone will be tracked, false if not.

      • addedZone

        void addedZone(Zone zone)
        A device tracked by the Tracker object has been added in the list. This method is called when a device has been added in the managed list (after addingDevice) and if the device has not disappeared before during the callback.
        Parameters:
        zone - the added device

      • modifiedZone

        void modifiedZone(Zone zone,
                String variableName,
                Object oldValue,
                Object newValue)
        Called when a zone tracked by the Tracker object has been modified. A tracked zone is considered modified according to tracker configuration.
        Parameters:
        zone - the changed zone
        variableName - name of the property that has changed
        oldValue - previous value of the property
        newValue - new value of the property

      • movedZone

        void movedZone(Zone zone,
             Position oldPosition,
             Position newPosition)
        Parameters:
        zone -
        oldPosition -
        newPosition -

      • resizedZone

        void resizedZone(Zone zone)
        Called when a zone tracked by the Tracker object has been resized.
        Parameters:
        zone - the resized zone

      • removedZone

        void removedZone(Zone zone)
        A zone tracked by the Tracker object has been removed. This method is called after a zone is no longer being tracked by the Tracker object.
        Parameters:
        zone - the removed zone.
